  • Home

    Genesis Pro Tools

    Documentation for all Genesis Pro Tools packages and CLI for Genesis developers.

    Get Started →

    Full Composer Support

    All packages are delivered through the standard PHP dependency management tool, Composer. This allows easy version control, lightweight VCS tracking, and package security.

    Included Open-Source CLI

    Genesis Pro Tools includes an open-source Command Line Interface, including support for package installation, file generation, and utilities. Starting new projects has never been easier or as consistent.

    Free Core Theme Package

    The Core Theme Package will always be free, and includes basic core functionality like useful theme constants, directory autoloading, starter theme files, and starter asset compiling configurations.

    Free Packages are MIT Licensed | Copyright © 2018-present Genesis Pro Tools
